value.fullName: Please bring a COMPLETE list of all prescription medications to your appointment.
value.label: Please bring a COMPLETE list of all prescription medications to your appointment.

value.fullName: Please bring a COMPLETE list of all over-the-counter medications (supplements and vitamins).
value.label: Please bring a COMPLETE list of all over-the-counter medications (supplements and vitamins).

value.fullName: Include in the list the dosage for EACH medication.
value.label: Include in the list the dosage for EACH medication.

value.fullName: SUGGESTION. Bring our medications in a bag with you or take a photo with your smart phone of the medication.
value.label: SUGGESTION. Bring our medications in a bag with you or take a photo with your smart phone of the medication.
